title: Rick Astley's Never Gonna Give You Up becomes the official Internet anthem, with every website you visit making you watch it and fines of $100 if you try to avoid it. How does this change your life? - Quora

response.answer_text: Easy. If you click on the video, at the end I reveal a foolproof and ingenious way to circumvent this insidious plan, so as to comply with the law and avoid seeing “Never gonna give you up.” Really, it can’t go wrong.
